chapter.title: Working the menu system
chapter.para: For a complete reference on available menu items and parameters, see .

note.para: If your radio is set to Memory (MR) mode, the following menu items will not take any effect:
STEP, TXP, W/N, CTCSS, DCS, S-CODE, PTT-ID, BCL, SFT-D, OFFSET, MEM-CH, BAND

section.title: Using short-cuts
section.para: As you may have noticed if you looked at , every menu item has a numerical value associated with it. These numbers can be used for direct access of any given menu item.
The menu is also organized in such a way that the ten most common functions are on top, and as can be seen in , these are also printed on the keypad so you don't have to remember them all.
The parameters also have a number associated with them, see for details.
